name: Infinite Space (Prototype)
description:
Controller highly recommended!!!

This is merely a prototype of a project in development.

Infinite Space is a puzzle adventure that has you control an alien whose mission is to solve puzzles through randomly generated levels as you jump through obstacles, bounce around in ball formation, and go through tight spaces in mini formation, and solve numerous puzzles to get to the next room!

Controls:

Left Stick / WASD - Move

A Button / Spacebar - Jump

X Button / E key - Interact with the Trigger Box / Pickup objects

Credits:

Tobey-Julian Joseph - Producer, Programmer, Level Designer, Level Supervisor

Dan Hill - Lead Level Designer, Texture Artist

Ronald DeSilva - Programmer, Level Designer

Robert Morrison - Environment Artist, Level Designer, Model Cleanup

Sam Burke - Character Designer, Animator
